edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.sigmaProtocol.elGamalCmtKnowledge

Class SigmaElGamalCmtKnowledgeProverInput

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.sigmaProtocol.elGamalCmtKnowledge.SigmaElGamalCmtKnowledgeProverInput
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SigmaProverInput, ZKProverInput

    public class SigmaElGamalCmtKnowledgeProverInput
extends java.lang.Object
implements SigmaProverInput
    Concrete implementation of SigmaProtocol input, used by the SigmaElGamalCTKnowldgeProver.

    In SigmaElGamalCTKnowldge protocol, the prover gets an ElGamal commitment message and a value w in Zq such that h = g^w.

    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Moriya Farbstein)
